name: html-css-js-template
description: HTML,CSS & JS template for Microverse. All linters and readme file included.

scripts.linters: yarn hint . && yarn run-stylelint && yarn eslint .
scripts.delete-branch: git push origin :gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.setup-gh-pages: git rm -r --cache . && git add *.html dist assets scripts -f && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.init-deploy: git checkout -b gh-pages  && yarn build && yarn setup-gh-pages
scripts.deploy: yarn delete-branch && git checkout -b gh-pages  && yarn build && yarn setup-gh-pages
